about_the_game:
Covert Ultra is an arcade-style tactical shooter, and every level is a lone-wolf terrorist hunt.
Play as a high-tech hitman for hire with spider-like abilities and compete to achieve each mission's best time and highest rank.

Efficiency is your only priority.

PLAN:




Utilize high-tech surveillance to learn the enemy's location. Memorize enemy patrol routes and behavior.

PRACTICE:




Speed and accuracy are the keys to an efficient operation.

Test your marksmanship and combat maneuvers in your very own practice range.
Inspired by real-life competition shooting, the player's rank classification is determined by their hit factor.

Check the leaderboards and test yourself against other operatives. Upgrade your loadout by clearing levels faster and in new ways. Unlock new attachments, weapons, and modifications to match your play style.

EXECUTE:


All hostiles must be eliminated, quickly and efficiently.

Dynamic Rappelling System:



Use stealth to gain an edge.
Rappel onto any surface, walk on any wall, and stalk your prey from above.

CQC System:



Use close-quarters melee combat to your advantage when the odds are stacked against you.
Use an enemy as a hostage while eliminating the others.

Weapon Customization:



Mastering your play style will reward you with an array of weapon attachments.
Completely overhaul your favorite weapons with barrels, stocks, suppressors, lasers, and ammo.

Master each level and become the ultimate assassin.

content_descriptors.notes: Violent acts of shooting, hitting, grabbing and kicking in a realistic setting. Blood splatters on characters and environments. Realistic depictions of characters being shot and killed.
